name: SPAGHET 2: AlDente Chapter
description:
You've found yourself in a very familiar situation. Just you and that warm plate of spaghet.

Well, in this case, plates...

You've been tasked to complete 4 special spaghet dishes in order to earn your freedom. Sounds simple enough, right?

Unfortunately, you aren't only one trying to get their hands on that precious pasta.

They see you, and they don't appreciate you trying to take what's theirs.

Will you escape?

Jumpscare Warning

 This game contains loud noises and jumpscares.

Epilepsy Warning

A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or visual patterns. Even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy may have an undiagnosed condition that can cause these "photosensitive epileptic seizures" while watching video games.

If you experience any issues with the game, or have some ideas/feedback, please let me know either by email (contact.tdindie@gmail.com), or on Twitter (@td_indie)
